sense.def:
Kdor je
unsophisticated
, nima veliko izkušenj ali znanja ali pa ima zelo preprost okus.

seg.quote: It is easy to write because the readers are relatively unsophisticated.

sense.def:
Naprava ali postopek, ki je
unsophisticated
, je zelo preprost.

seg.quote: These forecasts are based on rather unsophisticated economic analyses.
